quote: There's literally no excuse for not creating content. Buyers and sellers are googling and looking for videos.
why_clipworthy: It challenges agents to embrace video content as a necessity, not an option.
suggested_hook: Are you missing out on potential clients because you're not creating video content?

quote: Imagine if every REALTOR contacted their client every week with a report of what they've done.
why_clipworthy: Highlights a simple yet effective strategy to improve client satisfaction and retention.
suggested_hook: Want to keep your clients happy and informed? Try this simple weekly strategy.
